document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Neuth's Fine Nets on Slop Street in the Southern Ward.
document_data.name: Nueth's Fine Nets
document_data.mainbody: '''Nueth's Fine Nets''' was a shop in the city of [[Waterdeep]] that specialized in [[rope]]s and rope-related products.
document_data.Location: This store was located along [[Slop Street]],
document_data.Structure: Nueth's Fine Nets stood one story tall.
document_data.Services:
In addition to finely made ropes, Nueth's Fine Nets sold such rope-related products as gauze, [[hammock]]s, [[net]]s, [[tarp]] and window mesh, tow rope, rope bridges, ship shrouds and lines. The store also sold thin, [[wax]]ed climbing [[cable]]s that were popular among [[thieves]]. They were strong enough to hold a dozen large men at once and could withstand the blow of [[dagger]]s.

One-man throwing nets were sold at a price of 7 [[gold piece]]s. Stout tow ropes went for a price of 20 gold pieces per {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}}, with customers being able to buy them in multiples of ten up to a {{SI|1000|ft|long=yes}}. And the store's thin, waxed climbing cable was sold in multiples of up to four, each measuring {{SI|120|ft}}, for a price of 30 gold pieces.
